DOC.brief_title: Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Study With ( 11C ) Flumazenil Determine Central GABAA Receptor Occupancy AZD6280
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 1830 kg/m2 weight 60100 kg Clinically normal physical finding , medical history laboratory value . Clinically significant illness clinical relevant trauma within 2 week study start . History clinically significant heart arrythmias heart disease/problems .
